events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and appreciate your interest.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering according to your background and experience.
A recruiter experienced in engineering roles has been assigned to assist you throughout the hiring process.
Your initial phone screening was completed successfully, and you demonstrated strong software development skills.
You responded promptly to the interview schedule and confirmed your availability for the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10:00 AM to further assess your engineering skills.
You completed the technical interview with excellent problem-solving demonstrated throughout the session.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 10th to discuss your fit within the company culture.
The HR interview went well, and you expressed strong enthusiasm for joining the engineering team.
We are pleased to propose you an employment offer for the software engineer role with competitive benefits.
You provided positive feedback about the offer and expressed eagerness to review the full employment package.
You have officially accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you to our software engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started with orientation sessions scheduled to help you settle into your new role.
The hiring process is now closed successfully, and your employment as a software engineer is officially confirmed.
